query.statement: INSERT INTO VO_MOVIE (movie_id, title, director, genre_id, actors, runtime, release_date, ticket_price, now_playing, simple_upload_file_path) VALUES (:vo.movieId, :vo.title, :vo.director, :vo.genre.genreId, :vo.actors, :vo.runtime, :vo.releaseDate, :vo.ticketPrice, :vo.nowPlaying, :vo.filePaths)

UPDATE VO_MOVIE SET title = :vo.title, director = :vo.director, genre_id = :vo.genre.genreId, actors = :vo.actors, runtime = :vo.runtime, release_date = :vo.releaseDate, ticket_price = :vo.ticketPrice, now_playing = :vo.nowPlaying, simple_upload_file_path = :vo.filePaths WHERE movie_id = :vo.movieId
SELECT movie_id, title, director, genre_id, actors, runtime, release_date, ticket_price, now_playing, simple_upload_file_path FROM VO_MOVIE WHERE movie_id = :vo.movieId

SELECT movie.movie_id, movie.title, movie.director, genre.name, movie.actors, movie.release_date, movie.now_playing FROM VO_MOVIE movie, VO_GENRE genre WHERE movie.genre_id = genre.genre_id AND title like '%' || :vo.searchKeyword || '%' AND movie.now_playing = :vo.nowPlayingCondition
